text:
Yesterday, I was on the phone
with Haruki-chan for like, four hours!

Hehe, yeah!  
We even promised to do it again!
Talking to Haruki-chan is so much fun.

Haruki-chan may seem fluffy,
but she's really reliable.

And you know,  
even though we just joined the agency...

Both of us are so busy and it's tough,  
but when we talked about it...

Haruki-chan said,  
'Being busy is a good thing.'

She thinks it's proof that you're  
working hard for us, Producer.
Oh, come on, it's not really...

Haha, but hearing her say that  
made me feel the same way too.

But, to hear such words from her,  
I'll make sure to work even harder from now on.

Hehe, yeah!  
Let's work hard together, okay?
